education.cardTitle: Master of Business Administration - MBA, Computer Software Engineering
education.cardSubtitle: IGTI - Institute of Management in Information Technology, Belo Horizonte/MG, BR
cardDetailedText: Authentication and Authorization in Web Solutions
My bachelor's degree in Accounting brings several important assets to my career:
1. Analytical Skills: Apply problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities to code and system architecture.
2. Attention to Detail: Ensure precise, error-free code and conduct thorough testing and debugging.
3. Financial and Business Understanding: I gained expertise in financial software, transactions, and analysis.
4. Compliance and Regulation: Implement secure coding practices and adhere to industry standards and data privacy laws.
5. Communication and Collaboration: Facilitate effective teamwork, client understanding, and non-technical stakeholder communication.
6. Problem-solving Abilities: Apply complex problem-solving skills to optimize processes and find innovative solutions in development.
